initResponse:
Welcome to Bare Necessities! 
 Are you a vendor or a buyer? 
REPLY 1 (ONE) for vendor 
REPLY 2 (TWO) for buyer 
 Text EXIT if you would like to quit using the service.
isBuyerResponse:
Text your zipcode so that we can select vendors based on your location 
 Text EXIT if you would like to quit using the service.
listProductsInstructions:
Text a list of the goods you wish to purchase. For multiple goods, seperate each good on a new line. For Example:
Tomatoes
Potatoes
Rice
Eggs

 We will then display to you the vendors whose inventory best matches your products. 
 Text EXIT if you would like to quit using the service.
vendorListResults:
Here are the results that best match your location and products
REPLY with your selected vendors number to see more information. Text EXIT if you would like to quit using the service.
vendorResultsInstructions:
REPLY 1 (ONE) if you wish to search a new product,
REPLY 2 (TWO) to return back to the list of vendors
 Reply EXIT if you would like to quit the service
stop: Thank you for using Bare Necessities! We hope you enjoyed using our service.
checkExistingVendor:
Are you an already registered user? 
REPLY YES (Y) if you are an already registered user
REPLY NO if you are not an already registered user
registerationName: REPLY with you store, farm or vendor name.
registerationContactInfo:
REPLY with your phone number, email address and store address. Please seperate each piece of contact information with a new line.
 For example:
3013460387
aleogross@gmail.com
141 George St
Medford
MA
USA
02155
showVendorDetails: Here is the list of product information for your store:
showVendorOperations:
REPLY ADD and a new product name if you wish to add new product,
REPLY DELETE and the product number indicating the product you wish to delete to delete a product from you inventory
 Reply EXIT if you would like to quit the service
unrecognizedResponse: Unrecognized input message, please resend your response.
listVendorsResponse:
Here are the results that best match your location, products and product quantities.
1. Andrew’s Farm, Medford MA
2. Noah’s Farm, Sommerville MA
3. Keisha’s WholeSale Goods, Framingham MA

REPLY with the vendors number to see more information or EXIT if you would like to quit the service
